_instructions.purpose: This file maps soul weapon IDs to their emblem grid layouts
dataNeeded: Actual grid dimensions for each weapon (rows x columns)
Which slots are active/available for emblems (some grids may have inactive corners/edges)
Any special slot properties (central slots, bonus slots, etc.)
dataSources: Game files: Look for SoulGem or emblem-related data in decompiled assets
Manual extraction: Screenshot and map each weapon's grid in-game
Community: Check game wiki, Discord, or Reddit for grid layouts
howToUpdate: 1. For each weapon ID (1-57), determine its grid layout
3. Mark which slots are active (some grids have patterns, not all slots usable)
4. Add any special properties (locked slots, bonus slots, etc.)
5. Update the weapon entry with complete grid data
